text: @LRGBEATS @GovLarryHogan No, it's really not safe at all right now. The numbers of cases we are now seeing are from Memorial Day weekend we suspect. The numbers that will come from the protesting will be so significant that we will be in lockdown by July 4th for an undetermined amount of time.
